tasks.label: Create Site Structure
args: echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Starting Site Structure creation...' && echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Site Structure' > ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo 'Created initial file' && find ${workspaceFolder} -type d \( -path '*/node_modules' -o -path '*/.cache' -o -path '*/build' -o -path '*/public/build' \) -prune -o -type f -print | sed -e 's#${workspaceFolder}/##' -e 's/[^-][^\/]*\//  â”‚   /g' -e 's/â”‚   \([^â”‚]\)/â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ \1/' -e 's/\(â”‚   \)*â”‚   â””/\1    â””/' -e 's/â””â”€â”€ /â”œâ”€â”€ /' -e '$s/â”œâ”€â”€ /â””â”€â”€ /' >> ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo 'Generated structure' && code -r ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Site Structure creation completed.'
